biotools.summary:
This tool produces histograms or density plots from any tabular datasets, using ggplot2.
You may provide headerless tables as well as tables with column headers.
 Any non-numeric columns will be filtered out. Your first column may contains row names, but it will also work if your first column already corresponds to the numeric values of a variable.

bioschemas.name: ez_histograms
